dmca.title: Strydent Software Complains of Registration Codes on Google Groups
dmca.body:
STRYDENT

May 12, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Infringement Notification - InkSaver

To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing this on behalf of Strydent Software, producers of the InkSaver product. We have come across several Google Groups that are illegally posting registration codes for our products. We are asking for your cooperation in removing these postings from your Google Group [sic] sites.

The Message ID's we have identified so far are as follows:

-	b10s5u$kco$1@usenet.otenet.gr
-	58Sy9.23393$46.7l54@fe01
-	3d498c63$1@news.nb.nu
-	3d35dde8$1@news.nb.nu
-	3E53A9CA.B6B1CF2C@ath.forthnet.gr
-	zIbg9.ll57$jZ3.574064@newsfeed.slurp.net

I have attached copies of all the e-mail posts for your reference.


STRYDENT [ - page 2]

Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this serious matter. Please contact me at the e-mail address below when action has been taken to remove these groups.

Regards,

[private]
Chief Financial Officer
Strydent Software Inc.
[private]
Vancouver, BC V6H 3V3

e-mail: [private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signature - [private] (Strydent Software)
